storyInfo: Totter has an elaborate plan to help a client take revenge.

attributes.content: Open the door, you lousy scammer!
Open the damn door!
I know you're there! Open this blasted door already!
Good morning, Mr. Haller. You shouldn't be so loud; it'll disturb the others, you know.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Grabs Totter by the collar)
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Do you take me for a fool, you son of a bitch?!
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: You said you'd have it done by Friday! It's Friday, and all you've done is pack up and get ready to leave!
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Patience, my friend. I'll explain afterwards.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Pulls away Haller's hand)
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Explain? I don't need a goddamn explanation. I need results, you understand? I need the heads of those bastards on a platter, now.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: (Glances at watch) Just give me a little more time.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: You said five days. I gave you five days. What now?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: The plan is going well. You'll have your results soon enough.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Plan? What have you been doing the past four days?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: You drank coffee on Monday, played poker on Tuesday, went to the market on Wednesday, and slept through Thursday. Now it's Friday, and you haven't even moved your ass one inch from your room.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: (Glances at watch)
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Stop looking at your goddamn watch!
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: It’s not time yet.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: What? Are you telling me to calm down?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: ...I guess so?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Easy for you to say, you son of a bitch! It wasn't you who lost everything to those bandits!
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Oh, believe me, I could tell how little you had left by the amount you were offering.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: ...Yeah, if I had any left over, you'd be worrying about your own head instead of anyone else's.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: My, and here I thought we had a good partnership going.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Slumps against the wall)
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: I should've died along with my wife... At least then I wouldn't have to deal with this shit.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Would you like some hot water? I can get you a cup.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: You—forget it. Why should I talk to you about it? You don't know how I feel.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Not quite... I do know, to an extent.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Then do something. I'm begging you.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: (Glances at watch)
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Shakes head) *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: It's time. Would you like to come with me?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: For what?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Blood for blood, just like you asked.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Here we are. Have you hidden your burdenbeast?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Yes... Wait, why are you the one giving the orders, when I'm the one hiring you?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: My apologies, Mr. Haller. Would you like me to go tie it up again?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: No need. I'd rather you explained why you brought me all the way out here.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Take these.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Binoculars?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Look over there.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: I don't see anything.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Further. There's a convoy coming towards us from the horizon, flying blood-red flags with black skulls on them.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: I see it! It's them! It's them!
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: (Draws crossbow)
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: You don't need binoculars?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: But it's so far away.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Shh. Quiet.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Done.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: So quick?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Yeah... Unless there was something else?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: I mean, I'm not too keen on desecrating corpses, but if you insist...
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: You... you're sure there are no survivors?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: By the size of the explosion, I would say the odds are slim.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: They're dead. They're all dead. Good.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: You don't sound as happy as I expected.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: I thought I would be, but... it all happened so quick. Almost like it wasn't real.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Now, maybe this isn't the best time to bring this up, but as for the other half...
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Tosses out a bag of gold coins)
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Take it.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: (Picks up the bag)
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Don't you have anything to say?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: ...Thank you for your business?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Those eggheads spent a month trying to track that group down and came up empty-handed. How did you do it?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: How did you know they would show up right here, right now?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Actually...
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Ach, let's talk someplace else. I need a stiff drink.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: I wouldn't recommend drinking in your current state.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Ha... what would you know about it?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Apparently, the people in this town drink in the morning to celebrate the sunrise. I ordered two drinks. Which one do you want?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: They're not exactly the same size.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Yeah, the big one's mine.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Why did you ask me to choose, then?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: To be polite.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: I'll take the small one then, thank you.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Guzzles half the mug)
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Argh—burp.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: So can you talk now? How did you do it? You didn't prepare anything the last few days. You just showed up there, pulled back your crossbow, and whoosh—
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: They're gone.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: What the hell was that? Future sight? Did you bribe one of them?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Come on, tell me. I just don't understand. I was sure you were scamming me when I found you last night, but now...
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Let's just say that if you wanted me to lick your boots, I'd get on my knees this instant.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: You're getting a little too excited.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: I've had something to drink.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: It wasn't so hard. It's all about having a good plan, and following it step by step.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Takes out a notebook)
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: You complained that I spent all Monday in a cafe, but the cafe in this town plays an important role.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: It's sort of an information exchange for traders passing through.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: It's where all the news spreads, true or false.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Have you managed to get your spices out? I've tried other routes, but it seemed like they always knew where we were going.
attributes.name: Pepper Trader

attributes.content: Still thinking about what to do. I might just throw my hands up and hire mercenaries to guard the goods. Better than letting it rot in the warehouse.
attributes.name: Incense Trader

attributes.content: When is the lord ameer going to do something about this? I can't afford any more losses.
attributes.name: Pepper Trader

attributes.content: Hello, what can I get for you?
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Waiter

attributes.content: A cup of coffee, please.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Our coffee is strong by most places' standards, so it comes with a plate of honey dates to balance out the bitterness.
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Waiter

attributes.content: Thank you. I like my coffee bitter anyway.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: By the way, could I ask where the town doctor lives?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: The east side of town. Just head east along the fountain. Are you ill?
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Waiter

attributes.content: I have a batch of emergency medical supplies that I thought might come in useful for somebody.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Medicine, not money, is the most powerful currency in the barrenlands. Now that the cat was out of the bag, I had to prove I was worth the trip.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: I think my luck's about to change.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Time to cut your losses, buddy. Your wife isn't gonna like it when she finds out how much you've lost.
attributes.name: Jewelry Trader

attributes.content: Eh, it's just some spare change. I play for the thrill.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Ha, that's what we like to hear!
attributes.name: Timber Trader

attributes.content: One more round! Let's go!
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: I found footprints outside my window Wednesday morning, as expected. Someone tried to cover them up, but it was the work of an amateur.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Have you ever hunted, Mr. Haller?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Wild animals have their own territory, and they follow certain rules when they look for food or wander around in it. Understand their habits, and you'll know where to place your traps.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Leaving so soon, sir?
attributes.name: Hawker A

attributes.content: Yes, I'm concerned about these bandits I keep hearing about. The sooner I can leave, the better.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Do you know of any other routes out of here?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: To be honest with you, sir, it makes little difference whichever route you pick. They know every move you're about to make, and there's no way to avoid their ambushes.
attributes.name: Hawker A

attributes.content: Have you all been attacked before, then?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: My convoy tried leaving by a tiny trail to the east, but the bastards were laying in wait an hour out from town.
attributes.name: Trader B

attributes.content: That's terrifying. Has anyone managed to avoid them?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: We tried many different routes, big and small, but it makes no difference. You're doomed to run into them no matter what.
attributes.name: Trader B

attributes.content: I identified where the bandits operated by comparing the convoy routes to the locations where they encountered the outlaws.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: I found a few sniping vantage points, from which my crossbow could cover those areas.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: The final step was to lure my prey into the trap.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Hey, kid, wanna make some quick cash?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: What do you want, sir?
attributes.name: Shrewd Boy

attributes.content: I'm leaving town tomorrow. Get me ten days' worth of fresh water and dry rations, and have my burdenbeast fed before sunset. I'll be leaving before dawn.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Here are four gold coins for your trouble. I'll be waiting at the west entrance at 5 a.m. tomorrow.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Wow! You've got it, sir.
attributes.name: Shrewd Boy

attributes.content: Now get going, and don't disturb me. I need to sleep before the trip.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: No problem, sir. I'll get it done!
attributes.name: Shrewd Boy

attributes.content: Two gold coins would have been a fair price, but I paid him twice that.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: A kid that age can't help but brag when he runs into a stroke of luck. And the more people he tells, the better.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: So you weren't sleeping yesterday?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: No, I slept. Needed to be in top form for what was to come.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Takes a gulp)
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: So... that's what happened.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: You sound disappointed.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Yeah... I thought I'd hear the breathtaking story of a legendary mercenary, but it ended up being more like one of my wife's business proposals: detailed, but boring.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: A good plan doesn't need twists and turns. The safer it is, the better.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: That's what she said, too! She even had a notebook with her at all times, just like you.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: It's a good habit to have. People shouldn't trust their own memories. So what's she doing now?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: The bandits cut off her head... I told you that when I first came to you.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: ...Oh, right. Sorry.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: It's okay. At least she doesn't have to worry about writing any more business proposals. She'd probably have been a poet, if I hadn't dragged her into my business.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Yes, poet is a good occupation. Safe.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: To be totally frank with you, chatting with you makes me uncomfortable.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: I get that a lot. I'm just grateful to those who are satisfied with merely saying so. Plenty more wouldn't leave it at that.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: My brain tells me I should say something comforting, but my heart would never let me.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Shakes head) Never mind.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Can I take a look at your notebook?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Your writing is really big.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: I have something of an eye problem. I can see things far away perfectly, but things that are up close, not so much.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Looks like you meticulously plan out everything in life.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Yes. Having a plan in place makes things less hectic when trouble comes up.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Closes the notebook)
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Someone like you must have everything under control, with nothing ever going wrong or deviating from plan.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: I'm sure your life is smooth sailing. You'll never wake up one day only to find you've lost everything.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: (Guzzles the drink)
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: (Rubs the mug nervously)
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Not exactly...
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Not exactly what?
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: No, my life has hardly ever been in my control.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Takes a sip)
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Poor thing.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Please don't say that.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: I meant myself.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: (Finishes in a single gulp)
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Alright, I've got to go... Hey, where's my money? Oh, right, I gave you everything I had left.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: I'll pick up the tab.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: Why don't you take these gold coins? You'll need them.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Nah, I won't. Keep them.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: You're drunk.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Don't worry about it, I can stand on my own. Farewell, friend.
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: ♪I held her in my arms, before the day was gone♪
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: ♪She smelled of jasmine, beneath the purple veil♪
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: ♪Her soft lips take me away♪
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: ♪To our eternal home far away♪
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: ♪A moment of pain, for a lifetime♪
attributes.name: Vengeful Merchant

attributes.content: The drunk merchant staggers towards the rising sun, the great red orb on the horizon swallowing up his silhouette. He does not turn back, as though he is headed for his beloved's burning embrace.
The dry winds of the desert cover his song in a thin layer of sand, to be preserved for the next traveler.
♪Louisa, Louisa in my heart♪
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: ♪Take me home with you, and I'll want nothing more♪
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: ♪Louisa, Louisa in my dreams♪
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Totter, but we have to leave you here.
attributes.name: Low Male Voice

attributes.content: We're headed north, and there's no way you can keep up with that injury.
attributes.name: Low Male Voice

attributes.content: You'll just abandon me here?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: This is near the Snow Realm. It's a beautiful place.
attributes.name: Low Male Voice

attributes.content: But you're still abandoning me here, right?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: I'll leave some money for you. There's a village nearby where you can buy necessities.
attributes.name: Low Male Voice

attributes.content: Stop dodging the question! Answer me!
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Totter, I...
attributes.name: Low Male Voice

attributes.content: Do you think the same, Ann?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Don't be like that. You know we can't slow down for you. We have our missions to complete.
attributes.name: Calm Female Voice

attributes.content: So you're abandoning me.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: You're not a child anymore. Throwing tantrums won't get you anywhere.
attributes.name: Calm Female Voice

attributes.content: This isn't what we agreed on, Ann.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: No one can predict the future, Totter... We might be back by next spring. Or things may have changed by then. Don't beat yourself up over it.
attributes.name: Calm Female Voice

attributes.content: Ha. So will you come back for me?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: ...I see.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: ♪Louisa, Louisa in my heart♪
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: ♪Take me home with you, and I'll want nothing more♪
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: ♪Louisa, Louisa in my dreams♪
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: ♪I'll always be there...♪
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: ♪...Waiting for you♪
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Finishes in a single gulp)
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: The key. Where's the key?
attributes.name: Totter
Totter
attributes.content: Is it this one?

attributes.name: Totter
attributes.content: No, not this one.
This one?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: No... forget it.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Sits down)
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: ...What time is it? Must be almost time. I'll wait outside.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: The eaves of the roof casts a shadow on the hot sands, shielding Totter from the scorching sun.
Totter could not keep his eyelids open in the warm breeze.
He falls asleep, curled up against the door frame.
Totter! Totter! Wake up!
Hmnuh? ...Whoa! What is it?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: I'm here to pick you up. Sorry about the delay; we ran into a sandstorm on the way. Hope we didn't keep you waiting?
(Stands up and brushes the dirt off his pants) No, you came just in time.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: But you had fallen asleep.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Just a nap. I had to go out earlier.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Er... why are you smiling?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I'm smiling?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: (Touches the edges of his mouth)
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Strange. Why am I smiling?
attributes.name: Totter
